entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 later this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain and flurries changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
